custom-sql.sql: SELECT * FROM `timekeeping_users` LEFT JOIN `timekeeping_chucvu` ON timekeeping_users.chucvu_id = timekeeping_chucvu.id_ LEFT JOIN `timekeeping_phongban` ON timekeeping_users.phongban_id = timekeeping_phongban.id_ WHERE CONCAT_WS(' ', timekeeping_users.`hovaten`,timekeeping_users.`email`,timekeeping_chucvu.`name` ,timekeeping_phongban.`tenphong`) LIKE ? ;
